    The 5 Areas of Mastery at the Morten Hake Summit

    1. Deeper Inner Game

    Resolving the underlying roots of insecurity, nervousness and jealousy

    We’re gonna go DEEP into the ROOTS of who you are as a man, clearing out your inner-conflicts that keep you from utilizing your full potential. You’ll then be replacing them with new, empowering beliefs and the core confidence to be your most captivating self in any situation.

    • How to remove jealousy and negative feelings towards women (becoming that rooted source of good emotions in her life)
    • Free yourself from the destructive thoughts and feelings and experience a peace of mind from living in the present moment (and if negative thoughts try to sneak back you’ll have the tools you need to kick them back out!)
    • Break free from shyness and anxiety for social pressure and become an extroverted person who loves meeting new people.
    • How to eliminate any Limiting Beliefs and negative programming that’s subconsciously holding you back (once removed you’ll instantly feel liberated to do the things you always wanted to)

    2. Flirting and Charisma

    How to develop magnetic natural charisma and speak the language of women

    There’s a secret language that all women speak, that most men will never understand... But those few men who do, INSTANTLY fall into a different category of men in a womans mind. Once you understand this, women will start to open up to you - both emotionally AND sexually - letting you into a world most men never get to experience.

    • How to use laughter (the universal bonding tool) to create a personal connection with a woman the moment you meet her
    • How to make every woman you meet think of you in a sexual way even without saying a word
    • The ability to communicate on a deeper level, create deeper connections and congruent attraction. You will NOT learn the terrible old “pickup tricks” that lowers a girls confidence.

    3. Sexual Mastery

    Discover the secrets of the female orgasm, and become her fantasy lover

    You’re on a date with a woman and you want to kiss her… or you’re making out, and it’s time to “make the move”… but instead, You Choke. You crack. You buckle. You get freaked out by your fear and other emotions, and you blow it. Why?

    The truth is, most men don’t have a clue on how to satisfy a woman in bed.

    • The Power of Erotic Hypnosis: How to make her come without even touching her. Sounds unbelievable right? Honestly, I didn’t believe this myself until I saw it with my own eyes(!)
    • Eliminate the dreaded “pre-mature ejaculation” syndrome so you can last longer and never again have to worry about coming too fast (this deeper level solution is easier than most people think)
    • Learn the natural way of Sensual Kissing and Touching that makes a woman so turned on she’s begging you to take her home.
    • How to unlock the secrets of Multiple Orgasms and become her ultimate fantasy lover

    4. Relationship Mastery

    How to create and manage healthy, passionate, exciting relationships

    Have you ever been in a relationship that turns sour? Or had a woman lose interest in you? Jealousy, drama, other guys, new life-cycles, insecurity and poor communications are all dreadful pitfalls that every year destroys thousands of relationships and make your life a fucking misery. However, that’s NOT going to be you:

    • How to remove jealousy and negative feelings towards women (becoming that rooted source of good emotions in her life)
    • How to have Multiple Open Long-Term Relationships with women
    • How to nurture Long-term girlfriend and keeping the passion going
    • How to deal with breakdowns, jealousy and life-cycles.

    5. Lifestyle Design

    How to design an attractive dream lifestyle and effortlessly attract women into your life

    What if there was a way for you to set-up life in a way that made women want to constantly be around you as a natural part of your lifestyle?

    • How to set up your life so you are constantly meeting interesting, attractive, available women… without having to go out every night… and in a way that drives them to want to meet YOU
    • Identify your ideal self - and create your life-map and actionplan for constant personal growth (so you can have total clarity on your next step in life!)
    • How to create a massive social circle
    • How earn the respect from your peers, and become that trusted leader in your social circle

    100% Money Back Satisfaction Guarantee*
    In the event you have something come up and can’t make it to the Morten Hake Summit, you will get a full refund through August 1st, and a 50% money-back refund if you notify us before August 15th.     Useful Information

    How to get there

    You can either land in Oslo Gardermoen, Oslo Rygge, or Oslo Torp - it’s about the same distance from the city, however, Rygge and Torp sometimes tend to be cheaper destinations. Check our Travel Guide for more details and prices.

    Where to stay

    Attendees of the Morten Hake Summit receive a special discount on Hotels near the Summit. Prices vary from X to Y. Hostels, AirBNB and Couchsurfing are also big in Oslo! Check our Accomodation guide for more details and prices.

    When It Starts

    Doors open at 10.00am on Saturday morning. We’re wasting no time and the whole day will be an immersive experience. There will be plenty of breaks, and food will be sold at the location.

    NEED HELP?

    Fear not! Just send us an email at support@mortenhakesummit.com

    Frequently Asked questions

    What can I expect at Morten Hake Summit?

    If you’re expecting a traditional seminar, you’re in for a surprise! The Morten Hake Summit presents speakers who are PASSIONATE about giving you their most powerful training, profound mind shifts, groundbreaking ideas, and extensive knowledge to completely transform literally every part of your life.

    Speakers are constantly walking around holding mini-workshops, intimate lessons and answering questions throughout the breaks and lunch-hours.

    While you can still expect mind-blowing stage presentations from some of the top names in Dating, Sex, Relationships and Self-Development - the Summit you’ll connect with what we believe to be the most impactful group of extraordinary people within dating and personal development, who are driven to expand and immerse in their personal growth.

    Expect to form new friendships, deep connections and re-boot your life with an extensive new network of friends on the same path as you.

    How much are the tickets?

    The Morten Hake Summit delivers a world-class transformational education from the the best in the world when it comes to live and act like a man with purpose.

    I’ve literally spent over 5 years of my life reaching out to the REAL experts that walk the talk, becoming their friends, and persuading them to come to Norway for a FRACTION of the price you’d normally pay for their services.

    Every day most people waste their time, energy and money on things and experiences that doesn’t enrich the quality of life and are easily forgotten a year from now.

    Ask yourself: How much is it worth to you to become totally immersed in a 2 day world-class training by the worlds most insightful experts on dating and attraction?

    Is it worth more than the clothes you wear and accessories you sport? Is it worth more than the cover charges and overpriced drinks you pay at your favorite bars or clubs?

    Is it worth more than a few liters of gas or a few kilometers in a taxi? Is it worth more than wasting time living in the pity of your excuses when opportunity surrounds you?

    The Morten Hake Summit is an investment in yourself as a man. What you pay for in dollars will be returned many times over to you in terms of better life experiences, increased satisfaction and happiness (and satisfaction and happiness for the women you meet)

    You’ll never remember the measly $297 you invested, but one thing you’ll never forget is the day in your life when everything changed because you made the choice to live out your dreams and become the man you’ve always wanted to be.

    Don’t let fear or uncertainty stop you from creating the lifestyle you want.

    Secure your seat at the Morten Hake Summit.

    Do you have a guarantee and/or refund policy?

    Yes, of course! In the event you have something come up and can’t make it to the Morten Hake Summit, you will get a full refund through August 1st, and a 50% money-back refund if you notify us before August 15th. After that, you can send someone else in your place. You can email us at support@mortenhakesummit.com for questions on refunds.

    What should I bring with me?

    The most important thing is a positive attitude, an open-mind and the willingness to accept new ideas! A lot of the things you’re gonna discover may be counter-intuitive and even contradicting everything you’ve heard before! Trust the process, stay open-minded, and you’ll experience the fastest growth possible.

    Other than that, don’t worry - we got you covered! At the entry you’ll receive a free gift-bag containing everything you need to get the most out of your experience.
